dct_title_s: Societas Iesu per universum mundum diffusa praedicat Christi evangelium
dct_description_sm: California shown as a labeled island with an indented northern coast.
From part two [i.e. Geographica hierarchia] of Scherer's Atlas novus.
Engraved figures include: Ignatius Loyola, Joseph Anchieta, Andreas Oviedus, and Francis Xavier.
Gives the location of Jesuit missions world-wide.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
